alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 6:20AM CST until February 17 at 8:19PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Emory River at Oakdale TN. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding starts on Riverview Road. Homes closest to the river can have up to about 4 feet of water in them, while homes on the far side of the street will have flooded yards. At 28.0 feet, Homes on the near side of Riverview Road will have about 5 feet of water in them. Homes on the far side will have up to 2 feet. Riverview Road is completely impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 27.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EST.
